duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage team of BI professionals, responsible for development, growth, and performance of the team.
Partner with stakeholders, process specialists, business, and IT Data Warehouse Team to elicit and document business requirements for new reports.
Translate data results into written reports, tables, graphs, and charts to convey information to management.
Design, develop, and maintain reports and analytical tools.
Participate in due diligence and evaluation of systems for M&A integration.
Participate in cross-organizational teams to develop solutions meeting the needs of SPC LOB.
Provide technical support for existing reports, dashboards, or other tools.
Identify and analyze errors and inconsistencies in the data and provide timely resolutions.
Create written communication materials that effectively summarize findings and support recommendations.
Teach and advocate the use of business intelligence tools across levels of the organization.
Handle Data Warehouse help desk tickets as assigned.
Release reports to production, as requested.
Participate in developing integration timeline and communications for M&A Integration.
Follow and execute IT policies and procedures; suggest improvements as needed.
Manage BI Analyst progress on reports, as assigned.
Create ad hoc reports and views on a frequent basis to assist management in understanding, researching, and analyzing issues.
Reports up to Management the accurate status of current projects.
Perform quality assurance against new reports or other team member reports.
Perform ongoing monitoring and refinement of reports.
Handle Data Warehouse help desk tickets as assigned.
Release reports to production, as requested.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in data analytics, data science, computer science, management information systems, finance, statistics, or related field required; MBA or post-graduate degree preferred.
